Text:
Classification: Reality
Genre: Family | Sports
Status: Returning Series
Network: ESPN ( USA)
Airs: Tuesdays at 08:00 pm
Runtime: 90 Minutes
Premiere: October 06, 2009
Episode Order: 30

Inspired by ESPN's upcoming 30th anniversary, ESPN Films is launching 30 for 30, an unprecedented documentary series featuring 30 of today's finest storytellers who will chronicle 30 remarkable stories from the ESPN era. Each storyteller will bring their passion and point of view to their film detailing the issues and events that transformed the sports landscape since 1979.
(http://www.tvrage.com/30_For_30)
